0: In a year when every day feels like a cruel joke, it isn't really the time for April Fools' Day. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Maybe brands subconsciously realize that, because their April Fools' Day pranks this year are pretty tame. At least they're amusing themselves with fake ways to watch TV and hail cars. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Here are the notable ones so far: NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Amazon Petlexa NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Petlexa: Alexa, for your cat. Petlexa, "allows dogs, cats, and other animals to communicate with Alexa just like you do." Great! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Netflix Live NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Image: screenshot/netflix NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Netflix uploaded its April Fools' Day prank a day early and then canceled it the day of. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Netflix Live starred Will Arnett narrating footage of microwaves and copiers. Even though the joke is under the category "Recently Canceled by Netflix," you can still watch it. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Hulu's Hu NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Hulu went with a commentary on patience this April Fools' Day. Hu: TV Abbreviated shows you "your favorite shows, all in eight seconds or less." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Click on the banner introducing the service to watch condensed clips of The Mindy Project, Seinfeld, Empire and other shows Hulu has streaming rights to. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Lyft's Mono NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A few days early, Lyft rolled out Mono â€” a wearable that hails a Lyft for you when you raise your hand in the air (like raising your hand would do if you were hailing an actual taxi). NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Lyft quickly admitted the wearable was a prank, but the company did get Bella Hadid to try one out. #GetMono NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Learn Emoji with Duolingo NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Duolingo, the app that promises to teach you a language in five minutes a day, has a pretty fun proposition for April Fools. Today, the app will teach you how to speak emoji. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR If you have family members who are all over the place with their emoji usage (or don't use them at all), maybe they should check it out. Take a break from the Japanese lessons! NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Google NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Google has so many April Fools' Day jokes it needs its own list. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR So far, you can play Ms. Pac-Man on Google Maps, get a "Google Gnome" instead of a Google Home, and control the weather with windmills if you're using Google Netherlands.
